title: TVD Relationships
description: Test your knowledge of the romances and bonds!

questions.question: Who does Elena end up with at the end of the series?
questions.explanation: Elena ends up with Damon, and they live a long human life together after she takes the cure.

questions.question: Caroline and Klaus have a romantic relationship in the series.
questions.explanation: Caroline and Klaus develop feelings for each other, sharing a memorable moment in the woods before Klaus leaves for New Orleans.

questions.question: Who was Elena dating at the start of Season 1?
questions.explanation: Elena had recently broken up with Matt Donovan at the start of the series before meeting Stefan.

questions.question: Who does Caroline marry?
questions.explanation: Caroline marries Stefan Salvatore in the series finale, though their time together is tragically short.

questions.question: Bonnie has a significant relationship with which of Damon's friends?
questions.explanation: Bonnie falls in love with Enzo, and their relationship becomes one of the most beloved in later seasons.

questions.question: Alaric and Jenna Sommers were in a relationship.
questions.explanation: Alaric and Jenna dated, and her death at Klaus's hands deeply affected Alaric.

questions.question: What connects Elena and Katherine besides their appearance?
questions.explanation: Elena is the Petrova doppelganger, a descendant of Katherine who is also a doppelganger of Amara.

questions.question: Who is the father of Caroline's twins?
questions.explanation: Alaric is the biological father of Lizzie and Josie. Caroline was a surrogate after Jo died.
